metadata.description: Explore Sabrina the Teenage Witch's magical life in these stories from her very first comic book series! Featuring the work of legendary talents including George Gladir, Dan DeCarlo, and more, these spell-binding classic tales are sure to delight fans of all ages! Prepare to experience magical stories like "Strange Love”, "the Transylvania Touch" and more!
metadata.name: Sabrina the Teenage Witch
